name: Mnim's Cubetron
description:
Mix and Game Jam 2020.
Theme: Genre Mix.
Genres mixed: Action × Puzzle.

PLUNGE INTO THE [not so] CHILL WORLD OF CUBES

Mnim's Cubetron is the action game where you switch between powers to solve simple puzzles while avoiding being blown up.

I only had one day to make a game so I got my shit together and gathered a finished and polished tutorial level.

I plan to continue updating this game, because I really dig the idea.
